data.title: Yemen
data.meta_description: Law: Law No. (13) of 2012 regarding the right to information (only available in Arabic here) ('the Law on the Right to Information') Regulator: No further information Summary: The Law on the Right to Information outlines rights relating to information, the obligations or organisations to fulfil such rights, the appointment of an employee in organisations to supervise the use
data.text:
Law: Law No. (13) of 2012 regarding the right to information (only available in Arabic here) ('the Law on the Right to Information')

Regulator: No further information
